li.label: disciplined
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has been thoroughly disciplined and has become obscene in both body and mind. {PAWN_nameDef} is no longer ashamed to don't wear anything.

li.label: abyss bride
li.description: Whether by others or by herself, {PAWN_nameDef} has abandoned her life as an ordinary woman, and has become a plaything for a evil tree. There will be only excited in her future that will completely destroy her reason.
